articles.author: Timothy Rapp
articles.title: Fernando Mendoza Updates LinkedIn Bio After Indiana's CFP Title, Writes Inspirational Post - Bleacher Report
articles.description: Fernando Mendoza is probably a few months away from being the top overall pick in the 2026 NFL draft. But that doesn't mean he's above updating... his LinkedIn profile.
articles.content:
